name: Space Traffic (Escape_Pro34)
description: Space Traffic Controls: W- to use the thrust A and D- to turn left and right R-to restart Watch your fuel level closely and catch those refueling drops! Your fuel is the red bar on the body of the ship. Collect fuel drops to stay in the air, and good luck! Credit to my Dad, Brian P, for the art and music. My first game that I have completed and published, let alone in 48 hours. Please tell me what you think in the comments. Me and my dad would love to hear any feedback about anything in the game.
